text: Acartus hirtus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Farhoeus in 1872.Biolib.cz - Acartus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It is the type species for the genus Acartus. Diet The diet of the Acartus Hirtus is mostly unknown due to very little research done with this beetle. It is speculated to be a herbivore in nature. ==References== Category:Beetles described in 1872 Category:Acartus
title: Acartus hirtus
